title.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, January 7, 1907. The great hero of the Great Russian Revolution, Gregor Gershoni, in Chicago.

div.bibl: Courier, January 7, 1907. The great hero of the Great Russian Revolution, Gregor Gershoni, in Chicago.

body.p: A large Mass Meeting of the Chicago-group of Social-Revolutionists will be held in honor of their comrade and great champion of socialistic ideas, Gregor Gershoni, and Comrade Katz of New York, Wednesday, January 9th, 1907, at 8 PM, in Orchestra Hall, 168 Michigan Avenue. An excellent musical-program has been arranged for this occasion.
An excellent musical program has been arranged for this occasion.
Chairman P. Sussman is in charge of all arrangements in connection with this reception. Tickets may be obtained at the following places:
North-Western Economy Drug Store, 1015 Milwaukee Ave.
Isaacson Drug Store, 353 W. 12th Street, and
Delegates of all progressive organizations will please have their credentials ready when they present themselves for admittance.
